name: Formulary
title: DaVinci Payer Data Exchange (PDex) US Drug Formulary
description: DaVinci Payer Data Exchange (PDex) US Drug Formulary, Release 2.0.0 - US Realm STU"

resource.name: Formulary
resource.description: The Formulary provides general information about a formulary and acts as an organizing construct that associated FormularyItem resources point to. The Formulary combined with its associated FormularyItem and FormularyDrug resources represent a formulary list that includes the set of drugs covered and the requirements and limitations of the coverage.

resource.name: Formulary Bulk Data Graph Definition
resource.description: A GraphDefinition defining a graph of resources to return in a query for a Formulary related Bulk Data request.

resource.name: Formulary Drug
resource.description: Drug information which may be part of a formulary including its RxNorm code and dose form.

resource.name: Formulary Item
resource.description: A resource that describes a drug's relationship to a drug plan, including drug tier, prior authorization requirements, and more. The set of FormularyItem resources associated with a particular drug plan represents the drug plans formulary.

resource.name: Insurance Plan Location
resource.description: A Location describing a geographic region or are where the insurance plan coverage is available.

resource.name: Payer Insurance Plan
resource.description: The Payer InsurancePlan that defines the health insurance product, which include coverage benefits that are offered, and additional information about the offering, such as a coverage area, contact information, brochure locations, etc. The health insurance product offers one or more types of coverage, each of which may define a plan of covered benefits with the particular cost sharing structure offered to a consumer. Health insurance plans that include drug coverage reference a formulary that provides details about drugs that are covered under the plan including requirements and limitations of the coverage specific to each drug.

resource.name: Payer Insurance Plan Bulk Data Graph Definition
resource.description: A GraphDefinition defining a graph of resources to return in a query for a Formulary related Payer Insurance Plan Bulk Data request.

resource.name: Additional Coverage Information
resource.description: Additional drug coverage information that may include conditional coverage requirements such as a diagnosis pre-requisite, additional drug specific cost sharing information, or other coverage details not otherwise indicated.

resource.name: Availability Period
resource.description: The period for which this item is available on the formulary. Drugs may appear on a formulary, but not considered "active" for the current year.

resource.name: Availability Status
resource.description: A boolean indicating whether the formulary item is currently available under the formulary. Drugs may appear on a formulary, but not considered "active" for the current year. Drugs may also be removed during the course of a plan year.

resource.name: Drug Tier ID
resource.description: A code that describes the coverage status of a drug in a health plan (e.g., preferred generic, specialty, etc.)

resource.name: Formulary Reference
resource.description: Reference to the formulary this item belongs to.

resource.name: Pharmacy Benefit Type
resource.description: A CodeableConcept indicating the pharmacy benefit type the formulary drug is available through the associated plan.  This pharmacy benefit type is specific to the FormularyDrug and indicates which of the pharmacy benefit type from the plan applies to the particular formulary drug.

resource.name: Prior Authorization
resource.description: A Boolean indication of whether the coverage plan imposes a prior authorization requirement on this drug.

resource.name: Prior Authorization New Starts Only
resource.description: A Boolean indication of whether the coverage plan imposes a prior authorization requirement on this drug for new starts only. (Only include if PriorAuthorization = true)

resource.name: Quantity Limit
resource.description: A Boolean indication of whether the coverage plan imposes a quantity limit on this drug.

resource.name: Quantity Limit Detail
resource.description: A detailed definition of the quantity limits the coverage plan imposes on this drug. These limit details may include (potentially including a rolling dispense limit, maximum daily, or therapy days for a period of time. (Only include if QuantityLimit = true)

resource.name: Step Therapy Limit
resource.description: A boolean indicating whether the coverage plan imposes a step therapy requirement on this drug meaning another drug may need to be tried beforehand.

resource.name: Step Therapy Limit New Starts Only
resource.description: A boolean indicating whether the coverage plan imposes a step therapy requirement on this drug meaning another drug may need to be tried beforehand for new starts only (Not required if patient has previously met step therapy requirements).  (Only include if StepTherapyLimit = true)

resource.name: Benefit type of cost
resource.description: Benefit type of cost

resource.name: Qualifier for coinsurance rate
resource.description: Qualifier for coinsurance rate

resource.name: Qualifier of copay amount
resource.description: Qualifier of copay amount

resource.name: Drug tier of medication in health plan
resource.description: The drug tier of a particular medication in a health plan. The base set are examples. Each plan may have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Insurance item type
resource.description: Types of insurance items

resource.name: Pharmacy benefit types
resource.description: Pharmacy benefit types. Each payer will have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Type of plan contact
resource.description: Type of plan contact

resource.name: Semantic Drug Form Group Codes
resource.description: Semantic Drug Form Group codes with Term Types (TTY) of Semantic Clinical Drug Form (SCDG) and Semantic Branded Drug Form Group (SBDG)

resource.name: Semantic Drug Codes
resource.description: Semantic Drug codes with Term Types (TTY) of Semantic Clinical Drug (SCD), Semantic Branded Drug (SBD), Generic Pack (GPCK), or Branded Pack (BPCK)

resource.name: Codes for benefit type of cost
resource.description: Types of out of pockets costs associated with the benefit

resource.name: Codes qualifying the type of cost share amount
resource.description: Codes for qualifier of copay amount

resource.name: Codes for medication drug tiers in health plans
resource.description: Codes to represent the drug tier of a particular medication in a health plan.  Base set are examples.  Each plan may have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Codes for insurance item type
resource.description: Types of insurance items

resource.name: Codes for pharmacy benefit types
resource.description: Codes for pharmacy benefit types. Each payer will have its own controlled vocabulary.

resource.name: Codes for type of plan contact
resource.description: Type of plan contact

resource.name: US Drug Formulary Server Capability Statement
resource.description: This Section describes the expected capabilities of the US Drug Formulary Server actor which is responsible for providing responses to the queries submitted by the US Drug Formulary Requestors. The complete list of FHIR profiles, RESTful operations, and search parameters supported by US Drug Formulary Server are defined.
